meanings.definition: The act of becoming material or tangible.
meanings.sent1: The materialization of the cake made everyone excited for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The materialization of the painting took hours of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved the sudden materialization of a rabbit out of thin air.
meanings.sent4: The materialization of her dream into reality brought tears of joy to her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The materialization of the sun after a storm always brings a sense of relief.

meanings.definition: The process of bringing something into physical existence.
meanings.sent1: The materialization of the new building was a significant achievement for the construction team.
meanings.sent2: The materialization of the plan required careful coordination and hard work.
meanings.sent3: The materialization of the surprise party left her speechless with joy.
meanings.sent4: The materialization of a new idea can sometimes take time and effort.
meanings.sent5: The materialization of the sculpture from a block of marble was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: The manifestation or appearance of something in a physical form.
meanings.sent1: The materialization of the ghostly figure sent shivers down their spines.
meanings.sent2: The materialization of the concept in the form of a prototype was a breakthrough.
meanings.sent3: The materialization of the alien spaceship in the movie was a visual spectacle.
meanings.sent4: The materialization of her emotions in her artwork was evident to all who viewed it.
meanings.sent5: The materialization of the dream house was a moment of pure happiness for the family.
